title: #968 - Songs with preffered audio codec not available don't play - Solved

body:
Previously, on songs like "Прорицание" by "Fferyllt", where one of the audio codecs isn't available, if the preferred codec is one that isn't available, the song would not play. 

this commit fixes this by using the other codec if the preferred one isn't available.

This fixes issue #968
was targeting the master branch by mistake, my bad, doesn't really change anything since it was up to date
Thanks a lot for the contribution
